text:
[Verse]
Stars are shining bright above
Underneath the pale moonlight
Dancing in the quiet night
Let our spirits take their flight

[Verse 2]
Feel the breeze upon our skin
Music playing in the air
Hearts are beating in the wind
Love is spreading everywhere

[Chorus]
We can dance through the night
Underneath the silver light
We can dance holding tight
Everything will be all right

[Verse 3]
Footsteps echo on the ground
Laughter fills the empty streets
Happiness is all around
Together we complete the beat

[Bridge]
No need for words no need to speak
Just the rhythm of our feet
In this moment so unique
Life and love both felt so sweet

[Chorus]
We can dance through the night
Underneath the silver light
We can dance holding tight
Everything will be all right
title: Moonlight Dance
